en_text: Reduce total HP by 50%; 4x ATK for Balanced type

jp_skill.name: 創世の神効
jp_skill.raw_description: 総HPが半減するが、バランスタイプの攻撃力が4倍。

kr_skill.name: 창세의 신효
kr_skill.raw_description: 총 HP가 절반이 되지만 밸런스타입의 공격력이 4배가 됨

na_skill.name: The Holy Undertaking of Genesis
na_skill.raw_description: 4x ATK for Balanced Type, but halves overall HP
